hopobject.name: cellular
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0) AppleWebKit/537.11 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/23.0.1271.64 Safari/537.11
hopobject.body: The beaglebone device out of the box is capable of configuring and running shell scripts that put the device on the internet using a cellular USB device. Once the cellular internet connection is established, two way originations are possible, enabling the beaglebone device to post data to internet web sites and/or serve up various services to users addressing the beaglebone using it's cellular IP address.
hopobject.shortdesc: This project provides shell scripts and configuration information needed to put a beaglebone device on the internet using a cellular data connection.
